Residual value, EBITDA multiple method

Source: R/cf_functions.R
calculate_residual_valuation_ebitda_multiples.Rd

This function calculates residual values based upon the specified inputs. See calculate_residual_valuation_cap_rates for capitalization rate method.

calculate_residual_valuation_ebitda_multiples(ebitda_multiples = c(5, 10,
  15, 20), ebitda = "$27,500,000", cost_of_sale = "5%",
  debt_balance = "$350,000,000", return_wide = T)

Arguments

ebitda_multiples

vector of EBITDA multiples in numeric or character
ebitda

vector of EBITDA in numeric or character numeric/currency form
cost_of_sale

vector of cost of sale in percent or character percent form
debt_balance

vector of anticipated debt balance at sale in numeric or character numeric/currency form
return_wide

return data in wide or long form

Value

a data_frame

See also

Other calculation: calculate_cash_flow_dates, calculate_cash_flow_waterfall_partnership, calculate_cash_flow_waterfall, calculate_cash_flows_returns, calculate_days_accrued_pref, calculate_irr_periods, calculate_leverage_metrics, calculate_loan_payment, calculate_residual_valuation_cap_rates, calculate_share_proceeds, calculate_valuation_post_money, tidy_promote_structure

Other residual value calculation: calculate_residual_valuation_cap_rates

Examples

# NOT RUN {
calculate_residual_valuation_ebitda_multiples(ebitda_multiples = c(5, 10, 15, 20), ebitda = "$27,500,000", cost_of_sale = "5%", debt_balance = "$350,000,000", return_wide = T)
# }
